ComicInfo.Summary:
From shocking twists on classic literature, to brand new takes on modern day urban legends, this terror-filled series re-imagines the creepy stories you know and love for a new generation of readers. Keres, the goddess of death, loves to punish those she deems deserving of her wrath, and many unsuspecting people who cross her path are about to learn a harsh lesson about morality.
harry Prest has it all: a hot-shot job at a top design agency in manhattan, a beautiful, lavish home that overlooks the New York Skyline, and an even more beautiful wife. But when he starts to recieve srange, cryptic text messages from a phone number he doesn't recognize, everything starts to crumble.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Daniel Leister & Vinicius Andrade | 2 | C | Cover C | Noah Salonga & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cosplay Foil Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | E | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | F | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Mike DeBalfo (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | G | Keystone Comic Con Exclusive "Philly Super Fan" Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Paul Green (a) & Ula Mos (c) | Missing | H | Keystone Comic Con Exclusive"Best of Zenescope" Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
